dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, colonial possessions, islands surrounding continent.
"Illustrirter Handatlas" at top left corner margin.

10 pictorial vignettes: Timbuktu -- Sklavenkaravane in Dattelwald lagernd -- Sphinx und Pyramiden -- [People of various tribes] -- Mimose mit Weberv√∂gelnest -- [Various fauna] -- [Various fauna] -- Dorf im Sudan -- Afrikanischer Urwald -- [Various tribesmen].
